title: OTF Doodie Lo Speaks After Being Cleared on Abuse Allegations
description:
Doodie Lo talks about the painful battle he went through to clear his name. It was confirmed that his accuser lied and coached her kid to say false claims about Doodie. The public opinion ran with the story while Doodie's name was dragged all over the headlines. He is now suing the lady who lied about him.
